# GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/buildBetaDetail | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/buildBetaDetail ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-buildbetadetail)

-  GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/buildBetaDetail 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/buildBetaDetail

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-buildbetadetail#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/builds/{id}/relationships/buildBetaDetail
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-buildbetadetail#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-buildbetadetail#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[BuildBuildBetaDetailLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/buildbuildbetadetaillinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-buildbetadetail#see-also)

### [Getting Information Associated with Builds](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-buildbetadetail#Getting-Information-Associated-with-Builds)

[`Read the Build Beta Details Information of a Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-buildbetadetail)Get the beta test details for a specific build.[`Read the App Encryption Declaration of a Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-appencryptiondeclaration)Read an app encryption declaration associated with a specific build.[`Get the App Encryption Declaration ID for a Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-appencryptiondeclaration)Get the beta app encryption declaration resource ID associated with a build.[`List All Beta Build Localizations of a Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-betabuildlocalizations)Get a list of localized beta test information for a specific build.[`GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/betaBuildLocalizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-betabuildlocalizations)[`List All Diagnostic Signatures for a Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-diagnosticsignatures)List the aggregate backtrace signatures captured for a specific build.[`List All Icons for a Build`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-icons)List all the icons for various platforms delivered with a build.[`GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/icons`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-icons)[`GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/diagnosticSignatures`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-diagnosticsignatures)[`GET /v1/builds/{id}/relationships/appStoreVersion`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-builds-_id_-relationships-appstoreversion)
